ProductInfo.Features:
Image Sensor: CCD, color DSP. Signal System: NTSC. Horizontal Resolution: 420 TVL
Lens: 3.6 mm wide angle. IR Illuminators: 24 infrared LEDs for night vision. Minimum Illumination: 0.0 Lux (IR LED on)
Cable management: Concealed wiring inside of bracket to protect the camera from vandalism
Weatherproof metal housing for indoor and outdoor applications
Package included: 4 x bullet security cameras, 4 x 12V DC power supplies, 4 x video power cables with BNC/RCA connectors and 4 x security warning stickers
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 4 x Bullet Security Cameras Outdoor IR Infrared Color CCD Day Night Wide Angle for CCTV DVR Home Surveillance System with Power Supplies, BNC/RCA Cables WM4
